basics.name: Ujjwal Rastogi
basics.label: FullStack developer
basics.summary: A self-motivated, creative, and ambitious Fullstack developer looking for opportunity to make a direct impact. Bringing three years work experience and knowledge of various JavaScript Frameworks, RESTful services, Hybrid technology, and DevOps tools

work.summary: Working closely with clients to find out the requirements, finding out the solution and delivering the product.
highlights: Worked with clients all over the worlds on various different technologies

work.name: Codalien Technologies
work.summary:
Designing Architecture and APIs of the app. 
working with other developer and designers. 
 Worked on Linux servers and with various cloud services, to provide the best and cost effective solution.
highlights: Worked intensively with clients to deliver quality projects in time

work.name: Raintree Systems
work.summary:
Collaborate with other developers and engineers to fix, enhance and create various new features in the existing ecosystem, using their own proprietary language. 
Created a system to Parse PDF to readable text and identifying different columns for data aggregator module. 
 Overhauled the messaging module in order for it to support unicode characters. 
 Reworked the dynamic menu architecture to use MySQL database instead of XML files to increase efficiency and ease of modification.

awards.title: Smart India Hackathon
awards.summary: Worked on a system to suggest transfer of government employees

projects.description: A multi view video streaming service, where user can select which view to watch, and the ability to create a director’s cut. It has 3 levels of access - admin, users, and public.
projects.name: Multiview Video Streaming

projects.description: A school planner with the ability to add information, announcements, events, which get reflected to student’s dashboard. It has 3 types of users - company admin, school admin and students with different views for each.
projects.name: Digital School Planner

projects.description: A school planner with the ability to add information, announcements, events, which get reflected to student’s dashboard. It has 3 types of users - company admin, school admin and students with different views for each.
projects.name: Digital School Planner

projects.description: Android app to facilitate the process of a travel agent with lead management, creation of itinerary, sale, voucher, and invoice dynamically using various AWS services, as well as maintaining ledger and ability to send the reminder using social share. This app has 2 levels of access - the app owner and Travel agents.
projects.name: TravX
